EMA3706 - Structure and Properties of Ae.name: EMA3706 - Structure and Properties of Aerospace Materials

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: (CHS 1440 or CHM 2045C) and MAC 2312 with grades of "C" (2.0) or better in both.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Atomic structure, bonding, crystal structures, solidification, phase transformations, heat treatment, mechanical behavior, specific aerospace materials, materials design
